lu.uni.geko.util.ui
Class SimpleMessageConsole

java.lang.Object
  lu.uni.geko.util.ui.SimpleMessageConsole

public class SimpleMessageConsole
extends Object

A simple message console for output to the user wrapping a Eclipse UI MessageConsole.
